pull.title: tests: Fix accidental trunction from int to bool
pull.body:
Fix accidental trunction from `int` to `bool`.

Context: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14086#issuecomment-416610313

events.message: tests: Fix accidental trunction from int to bool

events.body: @MarcoFalke Thanks for reviewing. Feedback addressed. Please re-review :-)

comments.body: please use named arguments for literal primitive types. `{/* fDeterministic */ true}`
